item.title: Special bar doesn't appear
item.dc:creator: @eric_owner2 eric owner2
item.description:
@eric_owner2 wrote:

Just “x” out you’re client and re-open it.

Read full topic

item.title: Special bar doesn't appear
item.dc:creator: @leetzone leetzone
item.description:
@leetzone wrote:

im not sure what you mean here this is from magic shortbow i think you mean if it says checbar() or something but see.

{ if(IsAttackingNPC && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 ) { int EnemyX = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absX; int EnemyY = server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].absY; int offsetX = (absX - EnemyX) * -1; int offsetY = (absY - EnemyY) * -1; createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 80, 249, 43, 31, attacknpc+1); magespec = true; magespectimer = 2; setAnimation(426); actionTimer = 4; SpecDamgNPC(20); arrowattack = 8; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; sendMessage("You quickly shoot two arrows at the enemy."); } else if(IsAttacking && playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && SpecialDelay >= 5 && (PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].inwildy || PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].inwildy2) || (duelStatus == 3)) { int X = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absX; int Y = PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].absY; int offsetX = (absX - X) * -1; int offsetY = (absY - Y) * -1; SpecDamg(20); createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 80, 249, 43, 31, 0 - AttackingOn); magespec = true; magespectimer = 2; startAnimation(426); actionTimer = 4; arrowattack = 8; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; sendMessage("You quickly shoot two arrows at the enemy."); if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && !MBS) MBS = true; else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && SpecialDelay >= 5 && MBS) MBS = false; else { sendMessage("You dont have enough power."); } getFilling(); } }

and how do i make it refresh?

Read full topic

item.title: Special bar doesn't appear
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Is it even calling that method?

Restart your client, since the bars aren’t ‘refreshed’.

Read full topic

item.title: Special bar doesn't appear
item.dc:creator: @leetzone leetzone
item.description:
@leetzone wrote:

hey i’ve added specials now and if i wiel weapons it doesnt show the bar … this is what i got

public void CheckBar()
    {
        if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1305 && !Dlong)
            sendQuest("S P E C I A L  A T T A C K", 7586);
        else
        if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1305 && Dlong)
            sendQuest("@yel@S P E C I A L  A T T A C K", 7586);
        else
        if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1377)
	sendQuest("S P E C I A L  A T T A C K", 12335);

	sendQuest("S P E C I A L  A T T A C K", 12335);

	sendQuest("@yel@S P E C I A L  A T T A C K", 7486);
        else
        if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35)
            sendQuest("@gre@EXC", 180);
        else

        else

            sendQuest("@gre@SC", 12335);
	else

            sendQuest("@yel@SC", 12335);  
	else
	if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && !DDS)
            sendQuest("S P E C I A L  A T T A C K", 7586);
        else
	if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 5698 && DDS)
            sendQuest("@yel@S P E C I A L  A T T A C K", 7586);
        else
        if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && !MBS)
            sendQuest("S P E C I A L  A T T A C K", 7561);
        else
	if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 861 && MBS)
            sendQuest("@yel@S P E C I A L  A T T A C K", 7561);
        else
	if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587 && !DSCIM)
            sendQuest("S P E C I A L  A T T A C K", 7586);
        else
	if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4587 && DSCIM)
            sendQuest("@yel@S P E C I A L  A T T A C K", 7586);
        else
	if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1434 && !Dmace)
            sendQuest("S P E C I A L  A T T A C K", 7586);
        else
	if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1434 && Dmace)
            sendQuest("@yel@S P E C I A L  A T T A C K", 7586);
    }

		fsBar(0, 0, 7556);
		fsBar(0, 0, 7557);
		fsBar(0, 0, 7558);
		fsBar(0, 0, 7559);
		fsBar(0, 0, 7560);
	}
}
public void specbar(int id) 
{
outStream.createFrame(171);
outStream.writeByte(0);
outStream.writeWord(id);
flushOutStream();
}

public void fsBar(int id1, int id2, int id3)
{
outStream.createFrame(70);
outStream.writeWord(id1);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(id2);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian(id3);
}
